articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: US President Joe Biden and China's Xi Jinping to meet next week | 5 things to know | Mint - Mint
articles.description: China's foreign ministry said President Xi Xinjing would attend the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit (APEC) from Tuesday to November 17 at us President Joe Biden's invitation. Here's a sneak-peek into what their meeting would be like.
articles.content:
US President Joe Biden and Chinese President Xi Jinping are all set to hold a meeting in California on Wednesday, November 15, news agency Associated Press reported on Friday. 
 The White House said… [+5006 chars]
